5.name: Adventurer
5.text:
"This person was collapsed in front of the
village...! They're seriously injured, can someone
please take a look at them?"

8.name: Ma-kun
8.text:
"An elf... Not an adventurer, huh? Must be from
the nearby forest tribe."

9.name: Eric
9.text:
"So... what happened? Those wounds... they're
quite severe, aren't they?"

10.name: Elf
10.text:
"I'm sorry... please help us...! A green dragon
appeared in our forest..."

12.name: Elf
12.text:
"Our tribe fought back... but we couldn't match
him. Most of our people were either eaten or
tortured and toyed with for his amusement..."

13.name: Elf
13.text:
"At this rate, the forest will be completely
defiled by him. I'm sorry... we came to ask for
help from the people of the plains..."

16.name: Adventurer
16.text: "A green dragon is a dangerous foe..."

17.name: Adventurer
17.text:
"But if we leave it alone, there will be more
victims..."

19.name: Sol
19.text:
"I'll do it!! We can't let the green dragon get
away with this!"

20.name: Eric
20.text: "Sol, aren't you showing a lot of hostility?"

21.name: Isk
21.text:
"There's no other choice... For us metallic
dragons, the colored dragons are natural enemies.
Not only can we not tolerate their existence, but
to hear of such atrocities... As a golden dragon
born with the instinct to defeat evil..."

22.name: Eric
22.text:
"Ah, I see... I tend to forget because she's
usually so laid back, but this girl is a golden
dragon, isn't she?"

23.name: Isk
23.text:
"Yes... I tend to forget something, but she is a
golden dragon... She may resemble a puppy, but she
is not a puppy..."

26.name: Ma-kun
26.text:
"But the opponent is a dragon, and a big shot who
wiped out an entire elf tribe. Don't let your
guard down. Be fully prepared."

33.name: Narration
33.text:
The forest trembles, the trees sway in the fierce
wind, and leaves scatter. The master of this
forest, the green dragon, descends with flapping
wings.

34.name: Narration
34.text:
The dragon with emerald scales lets out a sneering
sound that resembles a growl... Gugugugu...

36.name: Green Dragon
36.text:
"Oh, so the clever elves are up to something... To
think they would rely on such a pitiful creature.
How pathetic!"

39.name: Green Dragon
39.text:
"Is that little one over there a golden dragon?
Hahaha, it's beyond pathetic! To think a golden
chick with a shell on its butt would dare to
oppose me!! Hahahahaha!!"

40.name: Green Dragon
40.text:
"Very well! I won't kill you easily! I will make
you suffer and show all the forest dwellers how
you cry and scream in pain! I look forward to
seeing the faces of the elves when they hear your
pitiful pleas for mercy!"

41.name: Sol
41.text:
"I absolutely won't allow that! I will take back
the forest of the elves!!"

44.name: Narration
44.text:
The roar of a great beast shakes the forest. The
shadows of two dragons intersect, making a
thunderous noise as they fall to the ground.

45.name: Narration
45.text:
The dust settles, and the silhouette becomes
clear. What appeared was the figure of a golden
dragon, perched on top of the massive green body,
attempting to deliver a decisive blow.

47.name: Narration
47.text:
In the moment when the Green Dragon opened its jaw
wide for one last desperate struggle and exhaled a
breath of poison gas... the sharp fangs of the
golden dragon tore off its head.

48.name: Narration
48.text:
Unable to even exhale its breath, the green dragon
spews blood. Its body, now headless, convulses
violently, but soon comes to a stop.

49.name: Narration
49.text:
As if announcing the death of the forest's master,
the birds flew away from the trees.
